70   * This tests AssignmentManager with a testing cluster.
71   */
72  @Category(MediumTests.class)
73  public class TestAssignmentManagerOnCluster {
74    private final static byte[] FAMILY = Bytes.toBytes("FAMILY");
75    private final static HBaseTestingUtility TEST_UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtility();
76    private final static Configuration conf = TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration();
77    private static HBaseAdmin admin;
78  
79    @BeforeClass
80    public static void setUpBeforeClass() throws Exception {
81      // Using the our load balancer to control region plans
82      conf.setClass(HConstants.HBASE_MASTER_LOADBALANCER_CLASS,
83        MyLoadBalancer.class, LoadBalancer.class);
84      conf.setClass(CoprocessorHost.REGION_COPROCESSOR_CONF_KEY,
85        MyRegionObserver.class, RegionObserver.class);
86      // Reduce the maximum attempts to speed up the test
87      conf.setInt("hbase.assignment.maximum.attempts", 3);
88  
89      TEST_UTIL.startMiniCluster(1, 4, null, MyMaster.class, null);
90      admin = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseAdmin();
91    }
92  
93    @AfterClass
94    public static void tearDownAfterClass() throws Exception {
95      TEST_UTIL.shutdownMiniCluster();
96    }

98    /**
99     * This tests region assignment
100    */
101   @Test (timeout=60000)
102   public void testAssignRegion() throws Exception {
103     String table = "testAssignRegion";
104     try {
105       HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(TableName.valueOf(table));
106       desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
107       admin.createTable(desc);
108 
109       HTable meta = new HTable(conf, TableName.META_TABLE_NAME);
110       HRegionInfo hri = new HRegionInfo(
111         desc.getTableName(), Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"));
112       MetaEditor.addRegionToMeta(meta, hri);
113 
114       HMaster master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
115       master.assignRegion(hri);
116       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
117       am.waitForAssignment(hri);
118 
119       RegionStates regionStates = am.getRegionStates();
120       ServerName serverName = regionStates.getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
121       TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnServer(hri, serverName, 200);
122 
123       // Region is assigned now. Let's assign it again.
124       // Master should not abort, and region should be assigned.
125       RegionState oldState = regionStates.getRegionState(hri);
126       TEST_UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().assign(hri.getRegionName());
127       master.getAssignmentManager().waitForAssignment(hri);
128       RegionState newState = regionStates.getRegionState(hri);
129       assertTrue(newState.isOpened()
130         && newState.getStamp() != oldState.getStamp());
131     } finally {
132       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(Bytes.toBytes(table));
133     }
134   }

136   /**
137    * This tests region assignment on a simulated restarted server
138    */
139   @Test (timeout=60000)
140   public void testAssignRegionOnRestartedServer() throws Exception {
141     String table = "testAssignRegionOnRestartedServer";
142     ServerName deadServer = null;
143     HMaster master = null;
144     try {
145       HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(TableName.valueOf(table));
146       desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
147       admin.createTable(desc);
148 
149       HTable meta = new HTable(conf, TableName.META_TABLE_NAME);
150       HRegionInfo hri = new HRegionInfo(
151         desc.getTableName(), Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"));
152       MetaEditor.addRegionToMeta(meta, hri);
153 
154       master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
155       Set<ServerName> onlineServers = master.serverManager.getOnlineServers().keySet();
156       assertFalse("There should be some servers online", onlineServers.isEmpty());
157 
158       // Use the first server as the destination server
159       ServerName destServer = onlineServers.iterator().next();
160 
161       // Created faked dead server
162       deadServer = ServerName.valueOf(destServer.getHostname(),
163           destServer.getPort(), destServer.getStartcode() - 100L);
164       master.serverManager.recordNewServer(deadServer, ServerLoad.EMPTY_SERVERLOAD);
165 
166       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
167       RegionPlan plan = new RegionPlan(hri, null, deadServer);
168       am.addPlan(hri.getEncodedName(), plan);
169       master.assignRegion(hri);
170 
171       int version = ZKAssign.transitionNode(master.getZooKeeper(), hri,
172         destServer, EventType.M_ZK_REGION_OFFLINE,
173         EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENING, 0);
174       assertEquals("TansitionNode should fail", -1, version);
175 
176       // Give region 2 seconds to assign, which may not be enough.
177       // However, if HBASE-8545 is broken, this test will be flaky.
178       // Otherwise, this test should never be flaky.
179       Thread.sleep(2000);
180 
181       assertTrue("Region should still be in transition",
182         am.getRegionStates().isRegionInTransition(hri));
183       assertEquals("Assign node should still be in version 0", 0,
184         ZKAssign.getVersion(master.getZooKeeper(), hri));
185     } finally {
186       if (deadServer != null) {
187         master.serverManager.expireServer(deadServer);
188       }
189 
190       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(Bytes.toBytes(table));
191     }
192   }

194   /**
195    * This tests offlining a region
196    */
197   @Test (timeout=60000)
198   public void testOfflineRegion() throws Exception {
199     TableName table =
200         TableName.valueOf("testOfflineRegion");
201     try {
202       HRegionInfo hri = createTableAndGetOneRegion(table);
203 
204       RegionStates regionStates = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().
205         getMaster().getAssignmentManager().getRegionStates();
206       ServerName serverName = regionStates.getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
207       TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnServer(hri, serverName, 200);
208       admin.offline(hri.getRegionName());
209 
210       long timeoutTime = System.currentTimeMillis() + 800;
211       while (true) {
212         List<HRegionInfo> regions =
213           regionStates.getRegionsOfTable(table);
214         if (!regions.contains(hri)) break;
215         long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
216         if (now > timeoutTime) {
217           fail("Failed to offline the region in time");
218           break;
219         }
220         Thread.sleep(10);
221       }
222       RegionState regionState = regionStates.getRegionState(hri);
223       assertTrue(regionState.isOffline());
224     } finally {
225       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table);
226     }
227   }

229   /**
230    * This tests moving a region
231    */
232   @Test (timeout=50000)
233   public void testMoveRegion() throws Exception {
234     TableName table =
235         TableName.valueOf("testMoveRegion");
236     try {
237       HRegionInfo hri = createTableAndGetOneRegion(table);
238 
239       RegionStates regionStates = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().
240         getMaster().getAssignmentManager().getRegionStates();
241       ServerName serverName = regionStates.getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
242       ServerName destServerName = null;
243       for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
244         HRegionServer destServer = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(i);
245         if (!destServer.getServerName().equals(serverName)) {
246           destServerName = destServer.getServerName();
247           break;
248         }
249       }
250       assertTrue(destServerName != null
251         && !destServerName.equals(serverName));
252       TEST_UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().move(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
253         Bytes.toBytes(destServerName.getServerName()));
254 
255       long timeoutTime = System.currentTimeMillis() + 30000;
256       while (true) {
257         ServerName sn = regionStates.getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
258         if (sn != null && sn.equals(destServerName)) {
259           TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnServer(hri, sn, 200);
260           break;
261         }
262         long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
263         if (now > timeoutTime) {
264           fail("Failed to move the region in time: "
265             + regionStates.getRegionState(hri));
266         }
267         regionStates.waitForUpdate(50);
268       }
269 
270     } finally {
271       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table);
272     }
273   }

275   /**
276    * If a table is deleted, we should not be able to move it anymore.
277    * Otherwise, the region will be brought back.
278    * @throws Exception
279    */
280   @Test (timeout=50000)
281   public void testMoveRegionOfDeletedTable() throws Exception {
282     TableName table =
283         TableName.valueOf("testMoveRegionOfDeletedTable");
284     HBaseAdmin admin = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseAdmin();
285     try {
286       HRegionInfo hri = createTableAndGetOneRegion(table);
287 
288       HMaster master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
289       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
290       RegionStates regionStates = am.getRegionStates();
291       ServerName serverName = regionStates.getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
292       ServerName destServerName = null;
293       for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
294         HRegionServer destServer = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(i);
295         if (!destServer.getServerName().equals(serverName)) {
296           destServerName = destServer.getServerName();
297           break;
298         }
299       }
300       assertTrue(destServerName != null
301         && !destServerName.equals(serverName));
302 
303       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table);
304 
305       try {
306         admin.move(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
307           Bytes.toBytes(destServerName.getServerName()));
308         fail("We should not find the region");
309       } catch (IOException ioe) {
310         assertTrue(ioe instanceof UnknownRegionException);
311       }
312 
313       am.balance(new RegionPlan(hri, serverName, destServerName));
314       assertFalse("The region should not be in transition",
315         regionStates.isRegionInTransition(hri));
316     } finally {
317       if (admin.tableExists(table)) {
318         TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table);
319       }
320     }
321   }
322 
323   HRegionInfo createTableAndGetOneRegion(
324       final TableName tableName) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
325     HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
326     desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
327     admin.createTable(desc, Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"), 5);
328 
329     // wait till the table is assigned
330     HMaster master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
331     long timeoutTime = System.currentTimeMillis() + 1000;
332     while (true) {
333       List<HRegionInfo> regions = master.getAssignmentManager().
334         getRegionStates().getRegionsOfTable(tableName);
335       if (regions.size() > 3) {
336         return regions.get(2);
337       }
338       long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
339       if (now > timeoutTime) {
340         fail("Could not find an online region");
341       }
342       Thread.sleep(10);
343     }
344   }

346   /**
347    * This test should not be flaky. If it is flaky, it means something
348    * wrong with AssignmentManager which should be reported and fixed
349    *
350    * This tests forcefully assign a region while it's closing and re-assigned.
351    */
352   @Test (timeout=60000)
353   public void testForceAssignWhileClosing() throws Exception {
354     String table = "testForceAssignWhileClosing";
355     try {
356       HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(TableName.valueOf(table));
357       desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
358       admin.createTable(desc);
359 
360       HTable meta = new HTable(conf, TableName.META_TABLE_NAME);
361       HRegionInfo hri = new HRegionInfo(
362         desc.getTableName(), Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"));
363       MetaEditor.addRegionToMeta(meta, hri);
364 
365       HMaster master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
366       master.assignRegion(hri);
367       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
368       assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
369 
370       MyRegionObserver.preCloseEnabled.set(true);
371       am.unassign(hri);
372       RegionState state = am.getRegionStates().getRegionState(hri);
373       assertEquals(RegionState.State.FAILED_CLOSE, state.getState());
374 
375       MyRegionObserver.preCloseEnabled.set(false);
376       am.unassign(hri, true);
377 
378       // region is closing now, will be re-assigned automatically.
379       // now, let's forcefully assign it again. it should be
380       // assigned properly and no double-assignment
381       am.assign(hri, true, true);
382 
383       // let's check if it's assigned after it's out of transition
384       am.waitOnRegionToClearRegionsInTransition(hri);
385       assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
386 
387       ServerName serverName = master.getAssignmentManager().
388         getRegionStates().getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
389       TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnlyOnServer(hri, serverName, 200);
390     } finally {
391       MyRegionObserver.preCloseEnabled.set(false);
392       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(Bytes.toBytes(table));
393     }
394   }

471

473         getRegionStates().getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);

475     } finally {
476       MyLoadBalancer.controledRegion = null;
477       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(Bytes.toBytes(table));
478     }

481   /**
482    * This tests region open failure which is not recoverable
483    */
484   @Test (timeout=60000)
485   public void testOpenFailedUnrecoverable() throws Exception {
486     TableName table =
487         TableName.valueOf("testOpenFailedUnrecoverable");
488     try {
489       HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(table);
490       desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
491       admin.createTable(desc);
492 
493       HTable meta = new HTable(conf, TableName.META_TABLE_NAME);
494       HRegionInfo hri = new HRegionInfo(
495         desc.getTableName(), Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"));
496       MetaEditor.addRegionToMeta(meta, hri);
497 
498       FileSystem fs = FileSystem.get(conf);
499       Path tableDir= FSUtils.getTableDir(FSUtils.getRootDir(conf), table);
500       Path regionDir = new Path(tableDir, hri.getEncodedName());
501       // create a file named the same as the region dir to
502       // mess up with region opening
503       fs.create(regionDir, true);
504 
505       HMaster master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
506       master.assignRegion(hri);
507       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
508       assertFalse(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
509 
510       RegionState state = am.getRegionStates().getRegionState(hri);
511       assertEquals(RegionState.State.FAILED_OPEN, state.getState());
512       // Failed to open due to file system issue. Region state should
513       // carry the opening region server so that we can force close it
514       // later on before opening it again. See HBASE-9092.
515       assertNotNull(state.getServerName());
516 
517       // remove the blocking file, so that region can be opened
518       fs.delete(regionDir, true);
519       master.assignRegion(hri);
520       assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
521 
522       ServerName serverName = master.getAssignmentManager().
523         getRegionStates().getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
524       TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnServer(hri, serverName, 200);
525     } finally {
526       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table);
527     }
528   }

530   @Test (timeout=60000)
531   public void testSSHWhenDisablingTableRegionsInOpeningOrPendingOpenState() throws Exception {
532     final TableName table =
533         TableName.valueOf
534             ("testSSHWhenDisablingTableRegionsInOpeningOrPendingOpenState");
535     AssignmentManager am = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster().getAssignmentManager();
536     HRegionInfo hri = null;
537     ServerName serverName = null;
538     try {
539       hri = createTableAndGetOneRegion(table);
540       serverName = am.getRegionStates().getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
541       ServerName destServerName = null;
542       HRegionServer destServer = null;
543       for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
544         destServer = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(i);
545         if (!destServer.getServerName().equals(serverName)) {
546           destServerName = destServer.getServerName();
547           break;
548         }
549       }
550       am.regionOffline(hri);
551       ZooKeeperWatcher zkw = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster().getZooKeeper();
552       am.getRegionStates().updateRegionState(hri, State.OFFLINE);
553       ZKAssign.createNodeOffline(zkw, hri, destServerName);
554       ZKAssign.transitionNodeOpening(zkw, hri, destServerName);
555 
556       // Wait till the event is processed and the region is in transition
557       long timeoutTime = System.currentTimeMillis() + 20000;
558       while (!am.getRegionStates().isRegionInTransition(hri)) {
559         assertTrue("Failed to process ZK opening event in time",
560           System.currentTimeMillis() < timeoutTime);
561         Thread.sleep(100);
562       }
563 
564       am.getZKTable().setDisablingTable(table);
565       List<HRegionInfo> toAssignRegions = am.processServerShutdown(destServerName);
566       assertTrue("Regions to be assigned should be empty.", toAssignRegions.isEmpty());
567       assertTrue("Regions to be assigned should be empty.", am.getRegionStates()
568           .getRegionState(hri).isOffline());
569     } finally {
570       if (hri != null && serverName != null) {
571         am.regionOnline(hri, serverName);
572       }
573       am.getZKTable().setDisabledTable(table);
574       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table);
575     }
576   }

578   /**
579    * This tests region close hanging
580    */
581   @Test (timeout=60000)
582   public void testCloseHang() throws Exception {
583     String table = "testCloseHang";
584     try {
585       HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(TableName.valueOf(table));
586       desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
587       admin.createTable(desc);
588 
589       HTable meta = new HTable(conf, TableName.META_TABLE_NAME);
590       HRegionInfo hri = new HRegionInfo(
591         desc.getTableName(), Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"));
592       MetaEditor.addRegionToMeta(meta, hri);
593 
594       HMaster master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
595       master.assignRegion(hri);
596       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
597       assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
598 
599       MyRegionObserver.postCloseEnabled.set(true);
600       am.unassign(hri);
601       // Now region should pending_close or closing
602       // Unassign it again forcefully so that we can trigger already
603       // in transition exception. This test is to make sure this scenario
604       // is handled properly.
605       am.server.getConfiguration().setLong(
606         AssignmentManager.ALREADY_IN_TRANSITION_WAITTIME, 1000);
607       am.unassign(hri, true);
608       RegionState state = am.getRegionStates().getRegionState(hri);
609       assertEquals(RegionState.State.FAILED_CLOSE, state.getState());
610 
611       // Let region closing move ahead. The region should be closed
612       // properly and re-assigned automatically
613       MyRegionObserver.postCloseEnabled.set(false);
614 
615       // region may still be assigned now since it's closing,
616       // let's check if it's assigned after it's out of transition
617       am.waitOnRegionToClearRegionsInTransition(hri);
618 
619       // region should be closed and re-assigned
620       assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
621       ServerName serverName = master.getAssignmentManager().
622         getRegionStates().getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
623       TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnServer(hri, serverName, 200);
624     } finally {
625       MyRegionObserver.postCloseEnabled.set(false);
626       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(Bytes.toBytes(table));
627     }
628   }

630   /**
631    * This tests region close racing with open
632    */
633   @Test (timeout=60000)
634   public void testOpenCloseRacing() throws Exception {
635     String table = "testOpenCloseRacing";
636     try {
637       HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(TableName.valueOf(table));
638       desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
639       admin.createTable(desc);
640 
641       HTable meta = new HTable(conf, TableName.META_TABLE_NAME);
642       HRegionInfo hri = new HRegionInfo(
643         desc.getTableName(), Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"));
644       MetaEditor.addRegionToMeta(meta, hri);
645 
646       MyRegionObserver.postOpenEnabled.set(true);
647       MyRegionObserver.postOpenCalled = false;
648       HMaster master = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster();
649       // Region will be opened, but it won't complete
650       master.assignRegion(hri);
651       long end = EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTimeMillis() + 20000;
652       // Wait till postOpen is called
653       while (!MyRegionObserver.postOpenCalled ) {
654         assertFalse("Timed out waiting for postOpen to be called",
655           EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTimeMillis() > end);
656         Thread.sleep(300);
657       }
658 
659       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
660       // Now let's unassign it, it should do nothing
661       am.unassign(hri);
662       RegionState state = am.getRegionStates().getRegionState(hri);
663       ServerName oldServerName = state.getServerName();
664       assertTrue(state.isPendingOpenOrOpening() && oldServerName != null);
665 
666       // Now the region is stuck in opening
667       // Let's forcefully re-assign it to trigger closing/opening
668       // racing. This test is to make sure this scenario
669       // is handled properly.
670       MyRegionObserver.postOpenEnabled.set(false);
671       am.assign(hri, true, true);
672 
673       // let's check if it's assigned after it's out of transition
674       am.waitOnRegionToClearRegionsInTransition(hri);
675       assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
676 
677       ServerName serverName = master.getAssignmentManager().
678         getRegionStates().getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
679       TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnlyOnServer(hri, serverName, 200);
680       assertFalse("Region should assigned on a new region server",
681         oldServerName.equals(serverName));
682     } finally {
683       MyRegionObserver.postOpenEnabled.set(false);
684       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(Bytes.toBytes(table));
685     }
686   }

688   /**
689    * Test force unassign/assign a region hosted on a dead server
690    */
691   @Test (timeout=60000)
692   public void testAssignRacingWithSSH() throws Exception {
693     String table = "testAssignRacingWithSSH";
694     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
695     MyMaster master = null;
696     try {
697       HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(TableName.valueOf(table));
698       desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILY));
699       admin.createTable(desc);
700 
701       HTable meta = new HTable(conf, TableName.META_TABLE_NAME);
702       HRegionInfo hri = new HRegionInfo(
703         desc.getTableName(), Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("Z"));
704       MetaEditor.addRegionToMeta(meta, hri);
705 
706       // Assign the region
707       master = (MyMaster)cluster.getMaster();
708       master.assignRegion(hri);
709 
710       // Hold SSH before killing the hosting server
711       master.enableSSH(false);
712 
713       AssignmentManager am = master.getAssignmentManager();
714       RegionStates regionStates = am.getRegionStates();
715       ServerName metaServer = regionStates.getRegionServerOfRegion(
716         HRegionInfo.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO);
717       while (true) {
718         assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
719         RegionState state = regionStates.getRegionState(hri);
720         ServerName oldServerName = state.getServerName();
721         if (!ServerName.isSameHostnameAndPort(oldServerName, metaServer)) {
722           // Kill the hosting server, which doesn't have meta on it.
723           cluster.killRegionServer(oldServerName);
724           cluster.waitForRegionServerToStop(oldServerName, -1);
725           break;
726         }
727         int i = cluster.getServerWithMeta();
728         HRegionServer rs = cluster.getRegionServer(i == 0 ? 1 : 0);
729         oldServerName = rs.getServerName();
730         master.move(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
731           Bytes.toBytes(oldServerName.getServerName()));
732       }
733 
734       // You can't assign a dead region before SSH
735       am.assign(hri, true, true);
736       RegionState state = regionStates.getRegionState(hri);
737       assertTrue(state.isFailedClose());
738 
739       // You can't unassign a dead region before SSH either
740       am.unassign(hri, true);
741       state = regionStates.getRegionState(hri);
742       assertTrue(state.isFailedClose());
743 
744       synchronized (regionStates) {
745         // Enable SSH so that log can be split
746         master.enableSSH(true);
747 
748         // We hold regionStates now, so logSplit
749         // won't be known to AM yet.
750         am.unassign(hri, true);
751         state = regionStates.getRegionState(hri);
752         assertTrue(state.isOffline());
753       }
754 
755       // let's check if it's assigned after it's out of transition.
756       // no need to assign it manually, SSH should do it
757       am.waitOnRegionToClearRegionsInTransition(hri);
758       assertTrue(am.waitForAssignment(hri));
759 
760       ServerName serverName = master.getAssignmentManager().
761         getRegionStates().getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
762       TEST_UTIL.assertRegionOnlyOnServer(hri, serverName, 200);
763     } finally {
764       if (master != null) {
765         master.enableSSH(true);
766       }
767       TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(Bytes.toBytes(table));
768     }
769   }

812   static class MyLoadBalancer extends StochasticLoadBalancer {
813     // For this region, if specified, always assign to nowhere
814     static volatile String controledRegion = null;
815 
816     @Override
817     public ServerName randomAssignment(HRegionInfo regionInfo,
818         List<ServerName> servers) {
819       if (regionInfo.getEncodedName().equals(controledRegion)) {
820         return null;
821       }
822       return super.randomAssignment(regionInfo, servers);
823     }
824   }

826   public static class MyMaster extends HMaster {
827     AtomicBoolean enabled = new AtomicBoolean(true);
828 
829     public MyMaster(Configuration conf) throws IOException, KeeperException,
830         InterruptedException {
831       super(conf);
832     }
833 
834     @Override
835     public boolean isServerShutdownHandlerEnabled() {
836       return enabled.get() && super.isServerShutdownHandlerEnabled();
837     }
838 
839     public void enableSSH(boolean enabled) {
840       this.enabled.set(enabled);
841       if (enabled) {
842         serverManager.processQueuedDeadServers();
843       }
844     }

846 
847   public static class MyRegionObserver extends BaseRegionObserver {
848     // If enabled, fail all preClose calls
849     static AtomicBoolean preCloseEnabled = new AtomicBoolean(false);
850 
851     // If enabled, stall postClose calls
852     static AtomicBoolean postCloseEnabled = new AtomicBoolean(false);
853 
854     // If enabled, stall postOpen calls
855     static AtomicBoolean postOpenEnabled = new AtomicBoolean(false);
856 
857     // A flag to track if postOpen is called
858     static volatile boolean postOpenCalled = false;
859 
860     @Override
861     public void preClose(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c,
862         boolean abortRequested) throws IOException {
863       if (preCloseEnabled.get()) throw new IOException("fail preClose from coprocessor");
864     }
865 
866     @Override
867     public void postClose(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c,
868         boolean abortRequested) {
869       stallOnFlag(postCloseEnabled);
870     }
871 
872     @Override
873     public void postOpen(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c) {
874       postOpenCalled = true;
875       stallOnFlag(postOpenEnabled);
876     }
877 
878     private void stallOnFlag(final AtomicBoolean flag) {
879       try {
880         // If enabled, stall
881         while (flag.get()) {
882           Thread.sleep(1000);
883         }
884       } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
885         Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
886       }
887     }
888   }
